Text: Family Life (Polish: Życie rodzinne ) is a 1971 Polish drama film directed by Krzysztof Zanussi.

Text: Family Life (1971 Polish film):  The film was also selected as the Polish entry for the Best Foreign Language Film at the 44th Academy Awards, but was not accepted as a nominee.
